Name: First Person Tennis - The Real Tennis Simulator
About the game: First Person Tennis is the first tennis simulator developed for HTC Vive , Oculus Rift and WMR . Now, you can play on a real tennis court and face professional tennis players. You'll have to show all your technical and tactical skills. VR Controls: Hold the controller/racket and play tennis. VR Features: Arcade and Simulation mode. Online Multiplayer. Vive Tracker support: Play with your real tennis racket! 3 different ways to run through the court: Teleport, Run in Place, Sliding Run. One handed serve.
